demoClassify

PURPOSE

DEMOCLASSIFY A demo used to test and demonstrate the usage of classifiers (clf*)

SYNOPSIS

function demoClassify

DESCRIPTION 

DEMOCLASSIFY A demo used to test and demonstrate the usage of classifiers (clf*)

 To change the demo parameters alter this function. Note that the
 visualization of the train and test data may look different due to
 different 2D projections (see visualizeData).

 USAGE
  demoClassify

 INPUTS

 OUTPUTS

 EXAMPLE
  demoClassify

 See also CLFKNN, CLFLDA, CLFSVM, CLFECOC, CLFDECTREE, VISUALIZEDATA

 Piotr's Image&Video Toolbox      Version 2.0
 Copyright 2008 Piotr Dollar.  [pdollar-at-caltech.edu]
 Please email me if you find bugs, or have suggestions or questions!
 Licensed under the Lesser GPL [see external/lgpl.txt]

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • clfEcoc Wrapper for ecoc that makes ecoc compatible with nfoldxval.
  • clfKnn Create a k nearest neighbor classifier.
  • clfLda Create a Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) classifier.
  • clfSvm Wrapper for svm that makes svm compatible with nfoldxval.
This function is called by:

0004 % To change the demo parameters alter this function. Note that the
0005 % visualization of the train and test data may look different due to
0006 % different 2D projections (see visualizeData).

0008 % USAGE
0009 %  demoClassify

0012 %
0013 % OUTPUTS

0015 % EXAMPLE
0016 %  demoClassify

0018 % See also CLFKNN, CLFLDA, CLFSVM, CLFECOC, CLFDECTREE, VISUALIZEDATA
0019 %
0020 % Piotr's Image&Video Toolbox      Version 2.0
0021 % Copyright 2008 Piotr Dollar.  [pdollar-at-caltech.edu]
0022 % Please email me if you find bugs, or have suggestions or questions!
0023 % Licensed under the Lesser GPL [see external/lgpl.txt]
0024 
0025 %%% generate data
0026 nClasses = 4;  d = 3;  nTrn=250;  nTst=150;  show = 1;
0027 
0028 [trnData,trnIDX,tstData,tstIDX] = demoGenData(nTrn,nTst,nClasses,d,1,6);
0029 nTrn=size(trnData,1);  nTst=size(tstData,1); %#ok<NASGU>
0030 if( show ) % make look different due to different projections
0031   figure(show); clf;
0032   subplot(3,1,1); visualizeData(trnData, 2, trnIDX ); title( 'train set');
0033   subplot(3,1,2); visualizeData(tstData, 2, tstIDX ); title( 'test set');
0034 end;
0035 
0036 %%% initialize learners:
0037 nnets=0; labels={};
0038 if(1); nnets=nnets+1; % linear LDA
0039   nets{nnets}.funNetInit = @clfLda;
0040   nets{nnets}.netPrms={'linear'};
0041   labels{nnets} = 'linear LDA';
0042 end
0043 if(1); nnets=nnets+1; % quadratic LDA
0044   nets{nnets}.funNetInit = @clfLda;
0045   nets{nnets}.netPrms={'quadratic'};
0046   labels{nnets} = 'quadratic LDA';
0047 end
0048 if(1); nnets=nnets+1; % kNN 5
0049   nets{nnets}.funNetInit = @clfKnn;
0050   nets{nnets}.netPrms={5};
0051   labels{nnets} = 'kNN 5';
0052 end
0053 if(0); nnets=nnets+1; % svm ecoc [VERY SLOW]
0054   nets{nnets}.funNetInit = @clfEcoc;
0055   nets{nnets}.netPrms={@clfSvm,{'rbf',2^-1},nClasses};
0056   labels{nnets} = 'ecoc svm-rbf';
0057 end
0058 
0059 %%% train each learner, and apply to test data
0060 pred = zeros( nTst, nnets );
0061 for i=1:nnets
0062   disp(['training ' labels{i} ' classifier']);
0063   net = feval( nets{i}.funNetInit, d, nets{i}.netPrms{:} );
0064   net = feval( net.funTrain, net, trnData, trnIDX );
0065   pred(:,i) = feval( net.funFwd, net, tstData );
0066   ncorrect = length(find(tstIDX==pred(:,i)));
0067   fprintf(['Classification result for ' labels{i} ...
0068     ':\n%i out of %i correct\n\n'], ncorrect, nTst);
0069 end;
0070 
0071 %%% calculate and show confusion matricies [not using confMatrixShow]
0072 CM = zeros( nClasses, nClasses, nnets );
0073 for i=1:nnets
0074   CMi = confMatrix( tstIDX, pred(:,i), nClasses );
0075   CM(:,:,i) = CMi ./ repmat( sum(CMi,2), [1 size(CMi,2)] );
0076 end;
0077 prm = struct('extraInfo',1,'cLim',[0,1],'mm',1,'labels',{labels});
0078 subplot(3,1,3); montage2( CM, prm );
